# uptimekuma_notification_rocketchat (Resource)

RocketChat notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification_rocketchat" "example" {
  name        = "RocketChat Notifications"
  webhook_url = "https://rocket.example.com/hooks/uid/token"
  channel     = "general"
  icon_emoji  = ":bell:"
  is_active   = true
  is_default  = false
}

resource "uptimekuma_notification_rocketchat" "with_button" {
  name        = "RocketChat with Button"
  webhook_url = "https://rocket.example.com/hooks/uid/token"
  username    = "Uptime Kuma"
  icon_emoji  = ":warning:"
  channel     = "alerts"
  button      = "View Status"
  is_active   = true
  is_default  = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Notification name
- `webhook_url` (String, Sensitive) RocketChat webhook URL

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `button` (String) Button text to include in notifications
- `channel` (String) Channel name to send notifications to
- `icon_emoji` (String) Icon emoji to display in RocketChat
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)
- `username` (String) Username to display in RocketChat

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
